greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, right border = A000041, else zero; by rows, A000041(n) preceded by n zeros. By columns, n-th column = A000041(n) followed by zeros.
comment: Eigensequence of the triangle = A058694: (1, 1, 2, 6, 30, 210,...); i.e. given A058694 preceded by a "1", triangle A174712 * the latter variant = the same sequence but shifted left.
formula: Diagonalized variant of A000041: the partition sequence as the right border of an infinite lower triangular matrix, else zero.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Mar 27 2010
